description:
Get ready to learn easy to learn and effective retouching techniques in Adobe Photoshop!

Photos require a subtle hand when it comes to retouching. In this course you will learn photo retouching techniques that photographers of any skill level can use. Whether youâ€™re touching up professional portraits or just want to make your casual pics ready for social media, then this course is for you.

In this course you'll learn a variety of retouching techniques in Adobe Photoshop. You'll learn how to smooth skin, brighten teeth and eyes, adjust the color of clothing and backgrounds. You'll learn a variety of photo retouching techniques such as how to identify areas for selective enhancement, improve color and contrast, and much more!
title: Learn Photo Retouching in Photoshop
